expected_output: We're open Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm.
actual_output: We're open Monday to Friday from 9am to 5pm. We're closed on weekends.
context: Business hours: Monday-Friday 9am-5pm, closed weekends and public holidays.

input: How do I return a product?
expected_output: You can return products within 30 days of purchase with a receipt.
actual_output: To return a product, you have 30 days from the purchase date and you'll need your receipt.
context: Return policy: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase. Original receipt required. Refunds processed within 5-7 business days.

expected_output: Yes, free shipping is available on orders over $50.
actual_output: Yes, we offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50.
context: Shipping policy: Free standard shipping on orders $50+. Express shipping available for $9.99. International shipping from $19.99.

input: What payment methods do you accept?
expected_output: We accept Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, and bank transfers.
actual_output: We accept major credit cards including Visa and Mastercard, as well as PayPal and direct bank transfers.
context: Accepted payments: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, bank transfer. No cash or cheques accepted.

expected_output: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days.
actual_output: Standard delivery typically takes 3 to 5 business days after dispatch.
context: Delivery times: Standard 3-5 business days, Express 1-2 business days, Same-day available in select cities.

expected_output: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of placing them.
actual_output: Yes, you can cancel your order within 1 hour of placing it through your account dashboard.
context: Order cancellation: Orders may be cancelled within 1 hour of purchase. After 1 hour orders enter fulfilment and cannot be cancelled. Contact support for exceptions.

expected_output: Yes, we have a points-based loyalty program where you earn 1 point per dollar spent.
actual_output: Yes, we offer a loyalty rewards program where you earn 1 point for every dollar you spend.
context: Loyalty program: Earn 1 point per $1 spent. 100 points = $5 reward. Points expire after 12 months of inactivity.

input: How do I track my order?
expected_output: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email.
actual_output: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email that you can use on our website.
context: Order tracking: Tracking number sent via email within 24h of dispatch. Track at website or carrier site. Allow 24h for tracking to activate.

expected_output: All products come with a 12-month manufacturer warranty.
actual_output: Yes, all our products include a 12-month manufacturer warranty covering defects.
context: Warranty: 12-month manufacturer warranty on all products. Covers manufacturing defects. Does not cover accidental damage or normal wear.

input: How do I contact customer support?
expected_output: You can reach support by phone, email, or live chat during business hours.
actual_output: You can contact our customer support team by phone, email, or live chat Monday through Friday during business hours.
context: Support channels: Phone (Mon-Fri 9am-5pm), Email (24h response), Live chat (Mon-Fri 9am-5pm). Weekend email support available.

expected_output: We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
actual_output: We take your privacy seriously and never sell or share your personal data with third parties.
context: Privacy policy: We collect only necessary data. No data sold to third parties. Data retained for 2 years. GDPR compliant. You can request data deletion anytime.

input: Can I change my delivery address?
expected_output: You can change your delivery address within 30 minutes of placing the order.
actual_output: Yes, you can update your delivery address within 30 minutes of placing your order by contacting us.
context: Address changes: Delivery address can be updated within 30 minutes of order placement. After that, order may have already entered processing. Contact support ASAP.

expected_output: Yes, gift wrapping is available for $4.99 per item.
actual_output: Yes, we offer gift wrapping as an add-on service for $4.99 per item.
context: Gift services: Gift wrapping available for $4.99 per item. Gift message included free. Gift receipt available on request.

expected_output: We use recycled packaging and source from sustainable suppliers.
actual_output: Yes, we use recycled packaging materials and work with suppliers who follow sustainable practices.
context: Sustainability: 100% recycled packaging since 2022. Carbon-neutral shipping option. Suppliers audited for sustainability. B-Corp certified.

input: Do you have a mobile app?
expected_output: Yes, our app is available on iOS and Android.
actual_output: Yes, we have a mobile app available for both iOS and Android devices.
context: Mobile app: Available on Apple App Store and Google Play. Features: order tracking, exclusive deals, loyalty points management. Rated 4.8 stars.

input: What if my item arrives damaged?
expected_output: Please contact support within 48 hours and we'll arrange a replacement.
actual_output: If your item arrives damaged, please contact our support team within 48 hours and we'll send a replacement immediately.
context: Damaged items: Report within 48 hours of delivery with photos. Replacement shipped within 1-2 business days. No need to return damaged item for orders under $100.

input: Can I place a bulk order?
expected_output: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk orders over 50 units.
actual_output: Yes, we do accept bulk orders and offer discounts for quantities over 50 units. Contact our sales team for a quote.
context: Bulk orders: Minimum 50 units. Discounts: 10% for 50-99, 20% for 100-499, 30% for 500+. Contact wholesale@company.com for quotes.

expected_output: Yes, we ship to over 30 countries worldwide.
actual_output: Yes, we offer international shipping to more than 30 countries around the world.
context: International shipping: Available to 35+ countries. Rates from $19.99. Delivery 7-14 business days. Customs duties may apply and are buyer's responsibility.

expected_output: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days to your original payment method.
actual_output: Once we receive your return, refunds are processed within 5 to 7 business days back to your original payment method.
context: Refund policy: Full refund within 30 days. Partial refund for opened items. Refund to original payment in 5-7 business days. Store credit option available.

input: How do I create an account?
expected_output: You can create an account on our website or mobile app using your email address.
actual_output: Creating an account is easy â€” just visit our website or app and sign up with your email address.
context: Account creation: Sign up with email or Google/Apple SSO. Verify email within 24h. Account gives access to order history, loyalty points, and saved addresses.
